column5: Our expansive and relaxing resort is set right on the shore of the beautiful 21,000-acre lake. Read more about the resort down below.Holiday Inn Club Vacations Piney Shores Resort features Rustic log cabins set against a backdrop of wooded serenity, offering peaceful relaxation. Lake Conroe boasts a wide variety of water sports, including fishing (native game fish are black bass, catfish and crappie), skiing, sailing, swimming, and boating. Covered boat slips and a launch ramp are on-site. 1780
column8: TX, Conroe Resort Fun for everyone
